text: The 2019 IHF Women's Super Globe was the first edition of the tournament. It was held in Wuxi, China from 1 to 4 August 2019. 1º de Agosto defeated China National Club in the final to win the inaugural event. ==Teams== The winners of continental tournaments, two host teams and a wild card team participate. {| class="wikitable" |- ! Team !
